title: Some questions about Keen
content:
1.Why in Keen 4 level "Lifewater Oasis" keen is immediately teleported down when he touch the top border with the Jump Cheat?
2. Where can i upload my levels for Keens 4-6.

[img]http://classicgaming.com/cc314/encyclopedia/images/enemyk4-wormouth.gif[/img]

title: Re: Some questions about Keen
content:
Sorry, I have no idea about the first one. I'm not good with Keen 4-6 engine details.. yet. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dopekeen.gif[/img]

The second; contact xtraverse and send him your stuff.Eat your veggies!

title: Re: Some questions about Keen
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]Why in Keen 4 level "Lifewater Oasis" keen is immediately teleported down when he touch the top border with the Jump Cheat?[hr][/quote]

It must be a glitch.Signed, Harvey Smith
A proud member of the beta testing society
"I help entertain!" -Harvey
Tough guys have no table manners![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dopefish.gif[/img]

title: Re: Some questions about Keen
content:
1.) The Keen engine is trying to keep track of where Keen is on the map. When you use the jump cheat the normal safeguard in the level is unable to cope and does a doubble take, causing this interesting little effect. Crystalus is another example of when the engine can't cope.

2.) Andrew, Xtra, me and Najawa will host them without question. KeenRush too I think.A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/rcwn.png[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: Re: Some questions about Keen
content: Yeah, once I got down to the bottom and got all those lives without cheating and thought I had uncovered a big secret or something, but I could never get back.  I guess that's why.

title: Re: Some questions about Keen
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]Yeah, once I got down to the bottom and got all those lives without cheating and thought I had uncovered a big secret or something, but I could never get back. I guess that's why. [hr][/quote]

Please explain me, how got you to the bottom! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smoke2.gif[/img] It's very interesting for me![img]http://classicgaming.com/cc314/encyclopedia/images/enemyk4-wormouth.gif[/img]

title: Re: Some questions about Keen
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]Crystalus is another example of when the engine can't cope.[hr][/quote]

Did you mean these strange things in the bottom (small) part of this level (in the end):

If you jump on the eminence and press the "Up" key, you will be able to see wall beyond this level part (in the down of main part). If you use Jump-cheat and No-clipping and then jump up you will see the whole main (big) part of this level!
If you save the game here and then load it, you can see the bottom tiles "Edge of map" and even some strange things behind the game-field.[img]http://classicgaming.com/cc314/encyclopedia/images/enemyk4-wormouth.gif[/img]

title: Re: Some questions about Keen
content:
Thats der bunny.
